channel.title: The Fallen Village recruiting
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "The Fallen Village recruiting"

item.title: Re: The Fallen Village recruiting
item.content:encoded: Enticement Altar, Nonja Lab, and so much more. Come join the village and be an important part of helping us grow.

item.title: The Fallen Village recruiting
item.content:encoded: The Kage of our village, one who never seemed to do much in the way of coordination or attempting to grow, recently left. Now, under a new and much more active leader, 'The Fallen Village' is searching for active members to help bring us out of the shadows and onto the top. We welcome new players and extend open arms to anyone that wishes to join us. With 78 upgrades, we have much to offer any new members and seek to grow even more.
